body:
i'm thankful that though i did not feel well yesterday morning, i have a job that is understanding and flexible and i went back to bed for the rest of the morning and then came back in the afternoon feeling much better.

i'm thankful that in the afternoon, i automated a very annoying manual process for my team and though there were some small bumps setting it up, i think it will save us all a lot of hassle and people appreciated the effort.

i'm thankful for the hypnotic magic of [optical sorting machines](https://twitter.com/SamDiss/status/938713808884916224).

i'm thankful for [this very sad but also very interesting article](https://www.nytimes.com/2017/11/30/world/asia/japan-lonely-deaths-the-end.html) about the lives and deaths of old people in japan. i'm thankful for [the image of hideo kojima and norman reedus](https://twitter.com/HIDEO_KOJIMA_EN/status/938236303665012737) eating cup noodles together.

i'm thankful for the return [my favorite live performance of a christmas song](https://twitter.com/deray/status/938594135094673408), which is patti labelle vamping valiantly over "this christmas," a song she doesn't know. i'm thankful for examples of people charging forward in impossible situations. i'm thankful for my backup singers.

i'm thankful for [the new miguel album](https://open.spotify.com/album/05LEST8E8mkEIl2LRfUkcI), which people have not been talking about enough. i'm thankful that he takes the sonic experimentation of _wildheart_ and weds it with bigger, richer, sweeter pop songs. i'm thankful to have read about how [he set out to make music that could function as an oasis](http://ew.com/music/2017/12/01/miguel-war-leisure-interview/) in a world that's so horrible all the time, how he "_wants \[his\] music to be a place for my audience to go and be able to feel good_.”

i'm thankful for [these gingerbread cookies](https://twitter.com/AliaM_H/status/937851352444792833) that accidentally look like they have jizz on them (bukkookies?)(sorry). i'm thankful for [this wild edit of ac/dc's "thunderstruck"](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/938381350255628289) where every time they say thunder the song speeds up 5%.

i'm thankful [for this burn](https://twitter.com/polly/status/938090436954087426). i'm thankful for [this amazing _nathan for you_ style story](https://twitter.com/Oobahs/status/938381964201086976) about a person turning his shed into a number one rated restaurant on tripadvisor.

i'm thankful for this picture of [a dog wearing a sweater](https://twitter.com/DogSolutions/status/937172481118490624). i'm thankful there are [other paths](https://twitter.com/dogdogs_album/status/938565556000587776) to warmth.

i'm thankful that though i did not feel well yesterday morning, i have a job that is understanding and flexible and i went back to bed for the rest of the morning and then came back in the afternoon feeling much better.

i'm thankful that in the afternoon, i automated a very annoying manual process for my team and though there were some small bumps setting it up, i think it will save us all a lot of hassle and people appreciated the effort.

i'm thankful for the hypnotic magic of [optical sorting machines](https://twitter.com/SamDiss/status/938713808884916224).

i'm thankful for [this very sad but also very interesting article](https://www.nytimes.com/2017/11/30/world/asia/japan-lonely-deaths-the-end.html) about the lives and deaths of old people in japan. i'm thankful for [the image of hideo kojima and norman reedus](https://twitter.com/HIDEO_KOJIMA_EN/status/938236303665012737) eating cup noodles together.

i'm thankful for the return [my favorite live performance of a christmas song](https://twitter.com/deray/status/938594135094673408), which is patti labelle vamping valiantly over "this christmas," a song she doesn't know. i'm thankful for examples of people charging forward in impossible situations. i'm thankful for my backup singers.

i'm thankful for [the new miguel album](https://open.spotify.com/album/05LEST8E8mkEIl2LRfUkcI), which people have not been talking about enough. i'm thankful that he takes the sonic experimentation of _wildheart_ and weds it with bigger, richer, sweeter pop songs. i'm thankful to have read about how [he set out to make music that could function as an oasis](http://ew.com/music/2017/12/01/miguel-war-leisure-interview/) in a world that's so horrible all the time, how he "_wants \[his\] music to be a place for my audience to go and be able to feel good_.”

i'm thankful for [these gingerbread cookies](https://twitter.com/AliaM_H/status/937851352444792833) that accidentally look like they have jizz on them (bukkookies?)(sorry). i'm thankful for [this wild edit of ac/dc's "thunderstruck"](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/938381350255628289) where every time they say thunder the song speeds up 5%.

i'm thankful [for this burn](https://twitter.com/polly/status/938090436954087426). i'm thankful for [this amazing _nathan for you_ style story](https://twitter.com/Oobahs/status/938381964201086976) about a person turning his shed into a number one rated restaurant on tripadvisor.

i'm thankful for this picture of [a dog wearing a sweater](https://twitter.com/DogSolutions/status/937172481118490624). i'm thankful there are [other paths](https://twitter.com/dogdogs_album/status/938565556000587776) to warmth.
